THANK YOU FOR THIS DVD !!

BTW, there is a colorized version that I'd love to see. If anyone has it, please upload it!

HI YA'ALL- THERE WAS A COLORIZED VERSION BY PAINTDOCTOR AT THIS 'HASH' - I'VE BEEN TRYING TO GET IT FOR ABOUT 3 WEEKS AND STUCK AT 75% - IF ANYONE KNOWS HOW TO GET AHOLD OF HIM AND GET HIM TO SEED IT, I'M KEEPING OPEN- HE HAD ADVERTISED A FEW REALLY GOOD OLDIES, COLORIZED AND ASKED FOR FEED BACK WHICH I REPLIED BUT TO NO AVAIL. I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND HIS DOWNLOADS (I'M BASICALLY NEW AT THIS AND DONT REALY KNOW MUCH) IF U CAN HELP, PLEASE DO SO, THANKS. R.
